headline: CrowdStrike Threat AI Leads Threat Intelligence into the Agentic Era
summary: AUSTIN, Texas & LAS VEGAS, September 17, 2025--Fal.Con 2025 -- CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced Threat AI, the industry’s first agentic threat intelligence system built to automate the most complex, time-consuming intelligence workflows and accelerate outcomes. As part of CrowdStrike's newly announced Agentic Security Workforce, Threat AI delivers mission-ready agents that reason across threat data, hunt adversaries proactively, and take decisive action across the kill chain, empowerin

headline: Falcon for IT Risk-based Patching Accelerates Cybersecurity and IT Consolidation on CrowdStrike
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, September 17, 2025--Fal.Con 2025, Las Vegas -- CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced Risk-based Patching with Falcon® for IT, accelerating cybersecurity and IT consolidation on the Falcon® platform. headline: TD SYNNEX Wins 2025 CrowdStrike Global Distributor Partner of the Year Award
summary: FREMONT, Calif. & CLEARWATER, Fla., September 17, 2025--TD SYNNEX announced it has been named CrowdStrike’s 2025 Global Distributor Partner of the Year at CrowdStrike Global Partner Summit at Fal.Con 2025.

headline: CrowdStrike (CRWD) Is Up 5.1% After New AI Partnerships and Falcon Platform Enhancements – Has the Bull Case Changed?
summary: Over the past week, CrowdStrike announced major AI-driven product enhancements to its Falcon platform and revealed expanded partnerships with tech leaders like NVIDIA, Salesforce, Meta, AWS, and Intel to strengthen security for enterprise AI applications. These developments mark a major step in integrating open AI models and no-code agent-building tools directly into cybersecurity operations, aiming to make advanced protection broadly accessible while unifying data and governance for AI...

headline: Seraphic Browser-Native Protection Now Available for Purchase on the CrowdStrike Marketplace
summary: LAS VEGAS, Sept. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Seraphic today announced at Fal.Con 2025 that its Secure Enterprise Browser (SEB) solution is now available for purchase in the CrowdStrike Marketplace, a one-stop destination for the world-class ecosystem of CrowdStrike-compatible security products. This availability enables customers to discover, buy, and implement Seraphic’s browser-native protection directly within the CrowdStrike Falcon platform.
